I stumbled across El Callejon whilst absolutely starving on my first night in Barcelona. I arrived around 8 so it was quiet then the restaurant gradually filled up around me.I ordered a steak which came with a salad and fried potatoes which was perfect washed down with an Estrella which was perfect. Absolutely nothing was wasted on the plate. I even ordered a chocolate brownie for dessert which also came with ice cream and was also delicious. The service was good and the whole bill came (just me) came to just over €20 which was outstanding value.
